title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. XI, subch. A, pt. 802 - Inspection Of Places Of Public Employment

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. § 802.1 - Purpose
